title: 2 BR, 1 BA Townhouse-Style Apartment for Rent - Clyde Ave
app_fee: $40 for credit, employment, background, and criminal records check
posting_body: 2 BR, 1 BA Townhouse-Style Apartment for Rent
Apartment viewings now being scheduled for a townhouse-style, 8 unit apartment building at 1051 Clyde Avenue in Cuyahoga Falls.
-	2 bedrooms (10'x11'), 1 bathroom, kitchen, dining/living room combo (10'x20'), carpet
-	1 car garage, parking for more vehicles, Under-stair storage
-	Refrigerator, electric oven/stove, dishwasher, garbage disposal
-	Electric washer/dryer hookups, central A/C, forced air gas heating
-	Close to Route 8 and the Chapel Hill Mall
-	Near corners of Tallmadge Rd., Buchholzer Rd., and Howe Ave.
-	Tenant pays inexpensive, city-leveraged utilities of H2O, gas, electric
